name: Fxglgames
tagline: This repo contains sample games built with FXGL
body: ## FXGLGames This repo contains sample games built with FXGL Game Library. ## Build ```bash cd PROJECT_NAME mvn package ``` This will produce a standalone executable with that project in target/. ## Run ```bash cd target/ java -jar PROJECT_NAME-VERSION.jar ``` OR simply double-click the jar file if the extensions are correctly set on your machine.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
